cf.AncillaryVariables.setprop¶

AncillaryVariables.setprop(prop, value)[source]¶

Set a CF property on each field.

fl.setprop(prop, value) is equivalent to for f in fl: f.setprop(prop, value).

Parameters:
prop : str

The name of the CF property.

value :

The value for the property.
Returns:

out : None

See also

cf.Field.setprop, delprop, getprop, hasprop

Previous topic

cf.AncillaryVariables.setattr

Next topic

cf.AncillaryVariables.sin
